DOC.brief_title: Randomized Controlled Clinical Trial Weight Loss Programs Obese Persons
DOC.detailed_description: The high prevalence obesity medical consequence make one important public health issue United States today . Few intervention consistently successful reduce obesity . This trial test intervention program last 22 week , 16 evening session one weekend day . Participants randomize one two arm . Both arm receive diet exercise intervention element . The study aim gradual weight loss , calorie target maintain ideal body weight , rather calorie restrict diet . The exercise component base around increase walking . The arm compare method produce long-lasting behavior change .
